Somehow I feel like someone is watching: I had just brought your granddaughter aboard my ship and was rowing back to the shore, when suddenly a guy with a cape appeared and threw me overboard!
I swam back here ... but that villain stole away with my ship and the girl.
Hopefully that girl had the good sense to hide herself.
If Vincent finds out about Nora, then she'll be in grave danger!
Vincent, you devil. If you dare to harm Nora, then I swear I'll hunt you to the end of the earth!
Nora ... I hope you are alright.
